name: md-math-field
author: skafis
description: A MdMathField (carta-md with mathlive) package with Web Component, React and Svelte components

scripts.build: npm run build:react && npm run build:svelte
scripts.test: npm run test:react && npm run test:svelte
scripts.test:react: npm run build && npm link && cd test-apps/react && npm link md-math-field && npm run dev
scripts.test:svelte: npm run build && npm link && cd test-apps/svelte && npm link md-math-field && npm run dev
